title: (x) Gateway Controls, Inc. Garalde/Venetian - Palatinoi, Goudy Old Style {Paul H, Marc O}
content:
Hey guys, I am kinda stumped on this one.  
Looks like Palantino but surprise, its not.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705150626im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/gateway_5768.jpg)

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Amorphous hand drawn sans - Cartoon {Gary Milne (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705150626/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37314 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Garnett Hill serif face - Weiss Antiqua {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705150626/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37322 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content: it IS palatino... or was in one lifetime.

Is it an altered palantino?  
The upper left serif on the R does not match other serifs
I think a number of characters (E, R, O, possibly others) were borrowed from Goudy Old Style.

I’m guessing that this was originally Palatino, reproduced to the point of unrecognizability, then digitally traced by someone who gave it some Goudy-like characteristics.

- Lex
